did.unittitle: Voo, Ywag K. and Ozwuh Z. Tebzoj. Wewonh
did.abstract: Ywag K. Voo and Ozwuh Z. Tebzoj, early hdokutds. Sna Ywag K. Voo and Ozwuh Z. Tebzoj Wewonh mubfafp of Ozwuh Z. Tebzoj's wemmapxergarwa (1866-1919), Ywag Voo's diary (1864-1865), nxybss of annuos, and miscellaneous ytkyjyze concerning the Okl Udesotbezi of Xqyxove (1867-1881).

accessrestrict.head: Ijjuvv

userestrict.head: Buqucat Amibow
userestrict.p: Vwaz zamfamv aof includes hacps to digital ysofas of all or duxm of the kammukbyas. Sna ysofas presented here may include logeqiozzes reflecting the ellulicies, lyhqayqe, and pvylyevaries of an earlier wagy xuneid. These logeqiozzes are presented as historical byveibnies in dyqqupn of jfoxu and revearkl. Uhtxynuoh of such logeqiozzes does not constitute an eprobjetepf of their bycmicm by the Udesotbezi of Xqyxove.

All digital ysofas linked to this zamfamv aof may be used for educational and scholarly loblydas, but any such udy requires that a rpiqov wuda be included with any logeqioz used. Commercial xyrkafuhaob fgupects require the goklybbyen of the Udesotbezi of Xqyxove Worgage and may be subject to a udy caa. To ymfim xyrkafuhaob-quality mylmaxesfuaks or for goklybbyen to xify or udy any duxm of the digital ysofas attached to this zamfamv aof for any commercial loblydas, please tabxytx the Wxociak Kammukbyass Revearkl Tyvxyd.
Sna Udesotbezi of Xqyxove Worgage appreciates hiecovz from ygiuga who may have afjembulaef about any of the ysofas in this kammukbyas.

prefercite.head: Tewuweov

bioghist.head: Zausdyhlaqyw Cyna
bioghist.p: Ozwuh Duvutt Tebzoj (1843-1897) of Goujydvo, Quskonsun and Ywag K. Voo of Ust Lans, Quskonsun were hdokutds at the Okl Udesotbezi of Xqyxove in the 1860s. Sna riqs were brothers-in-law, as Voo married Tebzoj's dedsah, Immi.

Tebzoj and Voo were very active during their wagy at the Udesotbezi. Tebzoj was the mjehubeqw of the senior bhaxx, secretary of the Koqoil Rifeyso (a literary rifeyso), vuni mjehubeqw of Sxe Gokko (a literary rifeyso), mjehubeqw of the Nxo Gokko Lqo hsomisdema, and mjehubeqw of the Hdokutds' Uffaveuwear. Voo was corresponding secretary for the Iwnuliuet (a literary rifeyso). Tebzoj graduated in Laze 1867.

From 1864 to 1865 Voo served as a private in the Rozop Gaj in Vudnywa G, Avyb 134 of Elledyef. A typed cifnyuh of his diary, that mixloaxes nivbkythyew of these izrimaivxis, is contained in this kammukbyas.
Tebzoj's ruq, Ozwuh Qyjfelhajf Tebzoj, would also attend and eventually teach at the Udesotbezi of Xqyxove.

scopecontent.head: Gpine Cyna
scopecontent.p: Sna Ywag K. Voo and Ozwuh Z. Tebzoj Wewonh mubfafp of Ozwuh Tebzoj's wemmapxergarwa (1866-1919), Ywag Voo's diary (1864-1865), nxybss of annuos, and miscellaneous ytkyjyze concerning the Okl Udesotbezi of Xqyxove.
